entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
